items.name: Calabar Waterfront Promenade & Artisan Market
items.short_description: A vibrant new riverwalk offering stunning views of the Calabar River, lined with local artisan stalls, food vendors, and performance spaces. Perfect for an evening stroll and cultural immersion.
items.address: Marina Resort Road, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: Calabar Eco-Canopy Walk
items.short_description: Experience the lush Calabar rainforest from a breathtaking perspective on this newly constructed canopy walk. Traverse suspended bridges high above the forest floor, spotting unique flora and fauna.
items.address: Afi Mountain Wildlife Sanctuary Road (near Calabar), Cross River State

items.name: The Calabash Bistro & Culinary Hub
items.short_description: A modern culinary institute offering cooking classes on Nigerian cuisine, featuring a chic bistro serving fusion dishes. A gastronomic delight for food lovers, recently opened to celebrate local flavors.
items.address: 15 Eyo Ita Street, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: Calabar Kids' Discovery Land
items.short_description: A state-of-the-art interactive museum designed to ignite curiosity in young minds. Features hands-on exhibits exploring science, culture, and nature, all through playful learning experiences for children.
items.address: 88 MCC Road, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: Tinapa Art & Culture Gallery
items.short_description: Showcasing contemporary Nigerian and West African art, this newly opened gallery also hosts workshops and cultural events, making it a vibrant hub for artistic expression and dialogue.
items.address: Tinapa Free Trade Zone, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: The Riverview Deck (Floating Restaurant)
items.short_description: Dine on the Calabar River itself at this unique floating restaurant, recently launched. Enjoy gourmet meals and cocktails with panoramic sunset views over the water, offering an unforgettable experience.
items.address: Calabar River (board near Marina Resort), Calabar

items.name: Calabar Adrenaline Zone
items.short_description: Get your pulse racing at this new adventure park featuring zip lines, high ropes courses, paintball, and rock climbing walls. Fun for teens and adults seeking a thrill and outdoor challenge.
items.address: Off Airport Road, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: The Calabar Flora Oasis
items.short_description: A beautifully landscaped botanical garden, recently opened, offering a tranquil escape with diverse plant collections, walking paths, and shaded relaxation areas. Perfect for nature lovers and peaceful contemplation.
items.address: 22 Murtala Mohammed Highway, Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: Ndidem Eco-Lodge & Wellness Centre
items.short_description: A sustainably built boutique lodge and spa offering luxurious comfort amidst nature. Focuses on local materials and eco-friendly practices, with rejuvenating spa treatments and serene surroundings, opened recently.
items.address: Ikom-Calabar Highway (outskirts), Calabar, Cross River State

items.name: Calabar Digital Heritage Centre
items.short_description: Explore Calabar's rich history and diverse cultures through immersive digital exhibits, virtual reality experiences, and interactive displays in this cutting-edge museum, launched in the last five years.
items.address: 5 Duke Town Road, Calabar, Cross River State
